question:
How likely do you think it is that each of the following will happen in the next 30 years?
There will be a terrorist attack on the U.S. as bad as or worse than 9/11

How likely do you think it is that each of the following will happen in the next 30 years?
China will overtake the U.S. as the world's main superpower

How likely do you think it is that each of the following will happen in the next 30 years?
There will be increasing violence against Jews in the U.S.

Still thinking about the future of our country, how worried are you, if at all, about each of the following?
The ability of political leaders to solve the country's biggest problems

Next are some pairs of statements that will help us understand how you feel about a number of things.
Please choose the statement that comes closer to your own views � even if neither is exactly right.

answers.1: In foreign policy, the U.S. should take into account the interests of its allies even if it means making compromises with them
answers.2: In foreign policy, the U.S. should follow its own national interests even when its allies strongly disagree

question: In the future, do you think...

answers.1: U.S. policies should try to keep it so America is the only military superpower
answers.2: It would be acceptable if another country became as militarily powerful as the U.S.

question:

answers.1:
Islam is more likely than other religions to encourage violence among its
believers
answers.2: Islam does not encourage violence more than other religions

answers.1: The land is split into two countries, one country with an Israeli government and one country with a Palestinian government
answers.2: All of the land is one country, governed jointly by Israelis and Palestinians together
answers.3: All of the land is one country, with an Israeli government
answers.4: All of the land is one country, with a Palestinian government
